column4: What repository to I need to have to install MythTV and all of its dependencies? I added deb http://www.debian-multimedia.org sarge main to the sources.list file, but I get messages that other certain packages are dependencies but they won't be installed or aren't installable.
I have the multiverse repo in the sources.list file and it isn't commented out. What could the problem be?
You sure it isn't backports multiverse?
The line about "universe" (with the "not supported" bit)
